import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', standalone: false, templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrl: './header.component.scss' }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit{ isDropdownOpen = false; ngOnInit(): void { } //@todo use UtilisService to call Open SideBar toggleDropdown() { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; } }
